data.eml:eml: Description of immatures of Chelymorpha reimoseri Spaeth, 1928 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Mesomphaliini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Świętojańska, Jolanta, Massuda, Kamila Ferreira, Stach, Małgorzata, Borowiec, Lech (2015): Description of immatures of Chelymorpha reimoseri Spaeth, 1928 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae: Mesomphaliini). Zootaxa 3949 (4): 515-539, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3949.4.3
